alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 24 at 10:51AM PDT until March 25 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Strongest through and below passes and canyons. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast, Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 9 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
